eu.smartdatalake.simsearch.engine.measure

Class DecayedSimilarity<V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.smartdatalake.simsearch.engine.measure.DecayedSimilarity<V>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - Type variable to represent the values involved in the similarity calculations (usually, double values).
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISimilarity<V>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MetricSimilarity

    public class DecayedSimilarity<V>
extends Object
implements ISimilarity<V>
    Implements a similarity measure based on an exponential decay function.

      (package private) IDistance<V> distance 
      (package private) double lambda 
      (package private) Scaling scale

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double calc(V v)
      Returns a similarity score in [0..1] according to the exponential decay function.
      double calc(V v1, V v2)
      Returns a similarity score in [0..1] according to the exponential decay function.
      IDistance<V> getDistanceMeasure()
      Provides a handle to the distance measure applied: Jaccard for categorical search; numerical difference for numbers; Haversine for spatial locations.
      int getTaskId()
      Provides the serial number of the task (thread) involved in the similarity search.
      boolean isScaleSet()
      Indicates whether the scaling factor has been set in order to report similarity scores.
      double scoring(double distance)
      Applies the exponential decay function on a given distance value.
      boolean setScaleFactor(double factor)
      Sets the scale factor to the given value.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DecayedSimilarity

        public DecayedSimilarity(IDistance<V> distance,
                         double decay,
                         double scale,
                         int taskId)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        distance - Parameterized distance measure to be used for calculating similarity scores
        decay - The decay constant to be applied in similarity calculations.
        scale - The scale factor used in normalizing distance values.
        taskId - The task that executes the query with this similarity measure.

        Applies the exponential decay function on a given distance value.
        Specified by:

      • getDistanceMeasure

        public IDistance<V> getDistanceMeasure()
        Description copied from interface: ISimilarity
        Provides a handle to the distance measure applied: Jaccard for categorical search; numerical difference for numbers; Haversine for spatial locations.

        Returns:

      • isScaleSet

        public boolean isScaleSet()
        Description copied from interface: ISimilarity
        Indicates whether the scaling factor has been set in order to report similarity scores.
        Specified by:
        isScaleSet in interface ISimilarity<V>
        Returns:
        True, if the scale factor is set (i.e., a value above 0); otherwise, False.

      • setScaleFactor

        public boolean setScaleFactor(double factor)
        Description copied from interface: ISimilarity
        Sets the scale factor to the given value.
        Specified by:
        setScaleFactor in interface ISimilarity<V>
        Parameters:
        factor - A double value representing the scale factor to apply on distances before issuing similarity scores.
        Returns:
        True, if the scale factor has been set and it is above 0; otherwise, False.

        Description copied from interface: ISimilarity
